channel.title: 路透财经
channel.description: 这是一个追踪路透财经news的种子

item.title: 印度阿达尼绿色能源公司将通过美元债券融资 4.09 亿美元
item.description:
India's Adani Green Energy to raise $409 mln via dollar bonds https://t.co/4ZR8NcfnkL pic.twitter.com/T7NwkmtWyK

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024

item.title: 印度西部马哈拉施特拉邦的一位高级官员表示，该邦将检查全球快餐品牌的分店，以检查它们是否在错误宣传含有真正奶酪的产品中使用奶酪替代品，从而扩大对麦当劳的打击之外的审查范围。
item.description:
India's western state of Maharashtra will inspect outlets of global fast-food brands to check if they use cheese alternatives in products wrongly promoted as containing real cheese, widening scrutiny beyond a crackdown on McDonald's, a top official said https://t.co/XerqSUSHJr

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024

item.title: Bouygues 在能源部门 Equans 的帮助下实现利润增长
item.description:
Bouygues posts profit rise helped by energy arm Equans https://t.co/KRwpUbhR06 pic.twitter.com/IbKR8slwlH

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024

item.title: EQT 240 亿美元私募股权基金艰难收官
item.description:
EQT hits hard closing on $24 bln private equity fund https://t.co/HMLSeeRbhb pic.twitter.com/6V4SE8hug0

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024

item.title: 官方数据显示，澳大利亚私营企业男性员工的收入比女性同事高出约 22%，政府首次公布了员工人数超过 100 人的企业的性别薪酬差距。更多信息
item.description:
Male employees in Australian private firms earn around 22% more than their women colleagues, official data showed, as the government released for the first time gender pay gaps at companies with more than 100 employees. More here https://t.co/V0uXUC1Cp0 pic.twitter.com/FoMtZGjZtG

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024

item.title: 英国资产管理公司良好行为准则》的编制者表示，该准则将进行全面审查，以促进经济增长和提高国际竞争力，此举可能会提高高层管理人员的薪酬。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Britain's code of good practice for asset managers will undergo a root-and-branch review to aid economic growth and international competitiveness, its compiler said, in a move that could see pay of top executives bumped up. More here: https://t.co/n92d7IDdi1

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024

item.title: 信安资产管理公司看好拉美，反驳中国观点

item.title: 观看：在太空探索公司宣布其奥德修斯号月球着陆器倾覆后，直觉机器公司的股价大幅下跌了 30% 以上。
item.description:
WATCH: Intuitive Machines witnessed a sharp fall of over 30% in its shares following the announcement by the space exploration company that its Odysseus moon lander had tipped over https://t.co/QjtA7iXwC7 pic.twitter.com/bWogzzwc9G

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024

item.title: 国际货币基金组织称，太平洋岛国应考虑债务换自然交易，以降低借贷成本
item.description:
Pacific Islands nations should consider debt-for-nature deals to lower borrowing costs, IMF says https://t.co/k1DswBMT3y pic.twitter.com/slpdXUeG15

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024

item.title: 观看：美国联邦贸易委员会和八个州表示，他们将提起诉讼，阻止连锁超市克罗格（Kroger）斥资 246 亿美元收购规模较小的竞争对手阿尔伯森（Albertsons）的交易，称这将提高数百万美国人的食品杂货价格。
item.description:
WATCH: The US Federal Trade Commission and eight states said they are suing to block supermarket chain Kroger's $24.6 billion deal to buy smaller rival Albertsons, saying it would boost grocery prices for millions of Americans https://t.co/53b3jMvqtB pic.twitter.com/ZdoNzBgFN4

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024

item.title: 瑞典 SBB 税前亏损减少
item.description:
Sweden's SBB posts smaller pretax loss https://t.co/PnTQB30OKz pic.twitter.com/ktm9aNPtgw

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024

item.title: 观看：美股小幅收跌，焦点转向即将公布的经济数据，包括美联储首选的通胀指标--1月份个人消费支出物价指数
item.description:
WATCH: US stocks ended with modest losses as the focus shifted to upcoming economic data including January's personal consumption expenditures price index, the Federal Reserve's preferred inflation gauge https://t.co/ZPpu6lDZRf pic.twitter.com/RkssNj9njA

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024

item.title: 联合国官员和外交官表示，共产党统治下的越南有望在今年批准联合国关于自由建立工会的公约，此举旨在降低贸易争端的风险，但可能会让一些外国公司感到不安。
item.description:
Communist-ruled Vietnam is expected to ratify this year the UN convention for the free establishment of trade unions, UN officials and diplomats said, in a move meant to cut risks of trade disputes but likely leaving some foreign companies uneasy https://t.co/LE7l4qfzrc

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024

item.title: 观看：新款雷诺风景在日内瓦国际车展上被评为年度车型。雷诺首席技术官吉勒-勒博格纳（Gilles Le Borgne）表示，该奖项是 "我们重返赛场的又一标志"。
item.description:
WATCH: The new Renault Scenic was voted Car of the Year at the Geneva International Motor Show. Renault Chief Technology Officer Gilles Le Borgne said the award is 'another symbol we are back in the game' pic.twitter.com/FWhdV9i0He

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024

item.title: 市场专家称，卡塔尔计划扩大液化天然气生产，到 2030 年将控制全球市场近 25% 的份额，并挤掉竞争对手的项目，包括美国总统拜登暂停新出口审批的项目。
item.description:
Qatar's planned expansion of liquefied natural gas production could see it control nearly 25% share of the global market by 2030 and squeeze out rival projects including in the US where President Biden paused new export approvals, market experts say https://t.co/mlABdlywSz

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024

item.title: 观看：这种眼球追踪人工智能功能让用户只需看着手机屏幕，就能远程控制汽车。该工具由中国科技公司荣耀开发，该公司最近推出了新款 Magic 6 Pro 智能手机
item.description:
WATCH: This eye-tracking AI function enables users to remotely control their car by just looking at their phone screen. The tool is developed by Chinese technology company Honor which recently launched its new Magic 6 Pro smartphone https://t.co/e2ILoHwF8U pic.twitter.com/LBnS7a4ohq

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024

item.title: 独家报道渣打银行（Standard Chartered）表示，由于本地市场和货币疲软导致海外投资需求激增，该行已暂停其中国客户通过基于配额的渠道向离岸产品进行新的投资。
item.description:
Exclusive: Standard Chartered has suspended new investments by its clients in China into offshore products via a quota-based channel, the bank said, amid a surge in demand for overseas investments due to weakness in the local market and currency https://t.co/Rokv7DyTsz

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024

item.title: 德勤称欧洲私人信贷回升至 2022 年中期水平
item.description:
European private credit rebounds to levels last seen in mid-2022, says Deloitte https://t.co/fV0MJcy6Bl pic.twitter.com/1Aiiclqsvv

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024

item.title: 雷诺和中国名爵在日内瓦车展上向欧洲推出了新款电动汽车，中国汽车制造商正试图从欧洲传统竞争对手手中抢占更多市场份额。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Renault and China-owned MG launched new electrified cars in Europe at the Geneva Motor Show as Chinese automakers seek to take more market share from legacy European rivals. More here: https://t.co/s42j1Wwe2d pic.twitter.com/gpcnGbesX0

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024

item.title: 新数据显示，包括联邦银行（Commonwealth Bank）、国家航空公司澳航（Qantas）和油气勘探公司伍德赛德（Woodside）在内的一些澳大利亚顶级企业的男女薪酬差距大于全国平均水平（19%）。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
The gender pay gap at some of Australia's top corporations including Commonwealth Bank, national carrier Qantas and oil and gas explorer Woodside is bigger than the national average of 19%, new data showed. More here: https://t.co/FjKAP2Ri4l

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024

item.title: 观看：在上周人工智能推动的反弹之后，美国股市收盘小幅下跌，原因是市场焦点转向了即将公布的经济数据，这些数据可能会影响美联储预期的降息时间
item.description:
WATCH: US stocks ended slightly lower after last week's AI-fueled rally, as the focus shifted to upcoming economic data that could affect the timing of the Federal Reserve's expected interest rate cut https://t.co/ZPpu6lDs1H pic.twitter.com/hHMs0HSuxc

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024

item.title: 越南计划进行工会改革以避免贸易困境，但外企可能感到不安
item.description:
Vietnam plans union reform to avert trade woes, risking foreign firms' unease https://t.co/9J9l4Qn4ZT pic.twitter.com/DvVdV8brJf

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024

item.title: 观看：直觉机器公司（Intuitive Machines）称其奥德修斯号（Odysseus）月球着陆器发生倾覆，公司股价随之下跌超过30%。
item.description:
WATCH: Intuitive Machines said its Odysseus moon lander had tipped over and took its share value with it, falling more than 30% https://t.co/QjtA7iWYMz pic.twitter.com/fyBMsLdlxu

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024

item.title: 随着经济和地缘政治困境刺激投资者纷纷撤离中国，许多人将资金转投日本，使基准日经指数在飙升至历史高位时获得额外的推动力。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
As economic and geopolitical woes spur an exodus of investors from China, many have been redirecting money into Japan, giving the benchmark Nikkei an extra boost as it rockets to all-time highs. More here: https://t.co/JQp4t7tF17

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024

item.title: 巴西与最大的气候融资联盟合作促进绿色增长
item.description:
Brazil partners with largest climate finance alliance to boost green growth https://t.co/JXwsUBOkEA pic.twitter.com/raz44J6fOh

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024

item.description:
Exclusive: StanChart suspends new investments from clients via China outbound channel https://t.co/GFNo18kece pic.twitter.com/Z2UHBF4Vzq

item.title: 观看：华尔街股指在人工智能引领的炙热反弹后收盘下跌，投资者正在为本周可能影响美联储降息路径的关键通胀数据做准备
item.description:
WATCH: Wall Street indexes ended lower after a scorching AI-led rally, as investors braced for key inflation data this week that could impact Federal Reserve's rate cut path https://t.co/ZPpu6lDZRf pic.twitter.com/syn4gbTgDh

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024

item.title: 观看：雷诺风景在日内瓦国际车展上被评为年度最佳汽车。 这款 SUV 获得了评委们 329 张选票，这也是雷诺第七次获得这一殊荣。
item.description:
WATCH: The Renault Scenic was voted Car of the Year at the Geneva International Motor Show. The SUV obtained 329 votes from jurors and marks the seventh time that Renault has bagged the coveted trophy pic.twitter.com/7zF8DGSWFu

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024

item.title: 美国财政部长珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）将在本周于巴西圣保罗举行的二十国集团（G20）财政官员会议前的新闻发布会上表示，美国经济的强劲增长是全球经济增长好于预期的 "关键驱动力"。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Strong US economic growth has been a ‘key driver’ of better-than-expected global growth, US Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen will tell a news conference ahead of this week's meeting of G20 finance officials in Sao Paulo, Brazil. More here: https://t.co/lVa26T7VRm

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024
